Expedient will provide an excellent IT infrastructure outsource experience, and, a clear economic and strategic value, by providing solutions comprised of managed services, co-location and enterprise access products to “local enterprise” business customers. Our offerings will be differentiated by highly reliable (and interconnected) facilities, relevant products and technically competent customer service.

WHen WE engage with our clients

Cloud computing and data centers are one of America’s fastest growing industries and we provide our customers with some of the most advanced solutions in:

  • Cloud (pubic, private and hybrid)
  • Managed backups
  • Disaster recovery
  • Colocation
  • Data Replication

We help companies decide on the ideal IT direction during these types of change events:

  • Hardware refresh
  • Compliance regulation changes
  • Evaluating the move to the cloud
  • Change in leadership or ownership
  • Accelerated growth and how to adapt IT systems
  • Want lower TCO with the Cloud
  • Have had a previous outage
  • Have new applications rolling out
  • Moving offices
  • Working on a big data project

One minute with us

CAREER OPPORTUNITIES

Expedient offers a competitive pay and benefits package, including health, dental, vision, and life insurance; reimbursement accounts; paid time off; company holidays; and a 401(k) program with a company match. Expedient is a proud member of the Continental Broadband family of commercial internet data providers wholly owned by Landmark Media Enterprises whose other companies are a diverse group of award-winning publications and media outlets, including newspapers, television broadcasting, cable TV programming, and electronic publishing. Expedient is an Equal Opportunity Employer, promoting a drug-free workplace. Qualified candidates may apply for the current open positions listed:

Most companies have a hardware refresh rate of 36-60 months where ours is 18-24 months. If you like new technology we have it!
